text:
Joy Fleming, aka of "Erna Liebenow", born as "Erna Raad", (15 November 1944 in Rockenhausen - 27 September 2017 in Sinsheim-Hilsbach) was a German singer of jazz, blues and schlager.
Career.
Fleming was best known for her performance in the Eurovision Song Contest in 1975. She performed the song "Ein Lied kann eine Brücke sein" and was placed seventeenth out of nineteen countries.
Joy Fleming died at the age of 72.
